metadata.name: Erlebnis 7/7 - Lust part 2
metadata.description:
Close your eyes,
Imagine thinking as if it were an infinite space.
Fill it.
Order it and remember.
Conscious intention captures,
tightens
and fold
the lived experience of life.
Like this,
to make her a slave to her own being,
shaping the individual
and making it a cultural animal.

Erlebnis like "lived experience" indicates the personal, unitary aspect for which the contents of consciousness are not received passively, but captured in a lively way in the flow of consciousness.

The masks were built by me with cardboard. Each photos describes a deadly sins. The scenario is Plato's world, that of ideas, which as in reality, there are various worlds. Similarly, in Hyperuranium, there are several alternatives. Theater is the quintessential form of fiction and imagination. lust is the only vice that manages to take other sins into consideration, and that is why all vices, even lust itself, are connected by a cable that carries them inside a computer where lust awaits there.

Lust 7/7 part 1
